applicationStarted.description: Thank you for applying for staff on The HauC3, make sure to fill out all questions to the best of your ability. Once you complete all questions your application will be submitted. You will receive a DM saying you have been accepted or denied later. Type "cancel" at any time to cancel this application.

applicationFinished.description: Thank you for applying for staff on HauC3. Your application has been submitted. You should receive a response within the next few hours.

applicationAccepted.description: Congratulations, Your application to become staff on HauC3 was accepted! Welcome to the staff team! If you have not recieved your Trainee rank, please contact a staff member.

applicationDenied.description: Unfortunetly, your application for staff on HauC3 was denied. This could be because you did not meet some requirements, or the staff team just doesn't like you. You can reapply in 2 weeks. If you attempt to reapply before 2 weeks are up, your ability to apply will be taken from you. Have a nice day.

verify.description:
Due to bot spam problems in the past, please go to the following URL and reply with your verification code to submit your application.
{url}

questions.question: 1. If you have one, what is you Minecraft IGN. Example: **nedmac_exe**
2. Do you have a working mic?
3. How often can you be in a voice channel
6. Why do you want to be staff?
7. Scenario: A staff member above you is abusing their power, what do you do?
8. Scenario: A user is spamming you asking for a higher rank, what do you do?
9. Scenario: A user is saying he is going to DoS, DDoS, or backdoor the server, or is threatening to DOX you or another user, what do you do?
10. What is your past experience with moderating?
11. Why do you feel you are a good fit for HauC3?
12. Do you understand that you must still follow all rules. This includes both global rules and staff rules?
13. Do you understand that you can be demoted without warning if staff have a valid reason. And if you feel it is not a valid reason, to contact the manager and owners?
14. Have you ever participated or attempted to participate in the destruction of Kermit's Meme Truck?
15. Anything else you would like to add?
16. Are you sure you would like to be staff?
